name: market for shale brick | shale brick | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/10693/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'shale brick', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;The product "shale brick" represents bricks produced from shale rock. Their production includes first ginding process, wet process (includes second ginding, mixing and plastifying), storage, forming (extruding molding method) and cutting, drying, firing, loading and storage. This product is used in the construction sector. 

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'shale brick',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'shale brick',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
